thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Hindustan Unilever Dec-Qtr Profit Up About 28 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Hindustan Unilever Dec-Qtr Profit Up About 28 pct
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Hindustan Unilever Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER PROFIT 13.26 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 10.38 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR DEC QUARTER PROFIT WAS 11.58 BILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER TOTAL INCOME 87.42 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 84 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* SAYS DEC-QUARTER EXCEPTIONAL CHARGE OF 210 MILLION RUPEES
* HINDUSTAN UNILEVER - ESTIMATED VALUE OF 1.19 BILLION RUPEES PROACTIVELY DISCLOSED TO CBEC ON GST RATE CUT ; CO OFFERED TO PAY SUO MOTU TO GOVERNMENT Source text: ( bit.ly/2DkURyn ) Further company coverage:
